title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Corporate
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Corporate 

Enforcement Authority) (Establishment Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited company act 2014 (corporate enforcement authority) (establishment day) order 2022

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 7th day of July 2022 is appointed to be the establishment day for
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of July 2022 is appointed to be the establishment day for 
the purposes of Chapter 3A (inserted by section 10 of the Companies 
(Corporate Enforcement Authority) Act 2021 (No. 48 of 2021)) of Part 15 of 
the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [337] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 July, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [337]

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020)), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 7th July 2022 to be the establishment day for the purposes 
of Chapter 3A (inserted by section 10 of the Companies (Corporate 
Enforcement Authority) Act 2021 (No. 48 of 2021)) of Part 15 of the 
Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014). 

 
 
 
 
 
 [337] 5
